=================================================

Documentary series looking at the work of special constables, members of the public who volunteer their time for the police.
.

1/15 Special assistant chief officer Alex Walden is called to a burglary in progress.

2/15 Special chief inspector Steve McCallion leads the team when they police a demonstration

3/15 Special constable Chris is involved in an operation to find thieves who have stolen a car.

4/15 Special sergeant Ross Spalthoff is on the trail of some youths with an air rifle.

5/15 Special sergeant Ross Spalthoff helps a disabled man who has been knocked over by a van.

6/15 Special sergeant Tony is on a drugs raid and the specials assist a security operation.

7/15 James is called to an incident where a man has barricaded himself in a kitchen.

8/15 Acting special inspector Harvey Barker is called to trouble on New Year's Eve.

9/15 Special constable Chris Hallatt is on the trail of robbery suspects.

10/15 Special chief inspector Bill Bond is hot on the heels of a driver who fails to stop.

11/15 Acting special inspector Harvey Baker investigates an assault.

12/15 Special constable James Chatfield finds himself in danger on a busy Christmas Eve shift.

13/15 Special sergeant Tony Bolton is on a drugs raid.

14/15 Special constable James Chatfield is on a busy shift on New Year's Eve.

15/15 Special constable Chris Hallatt is on the lookout for robbery suspects.
